Author: anrecovery
Text: i think a lot of us have a superrrrr black and white image of food.  we have a category of yes or no foods, so when we eat something we consider “unhealthy” “bad” “high calorie” foods, it can kind of be a trigger that we’re losing control of our strict way of eating  but you didn’t do anything wrong! you ate foods that were healthy and nutritious and will give you fuel and energy, no need to listen to the ED voice telling you you’ve ruined your day. you have indeed not!!!! you can do this!
